location.title: Welcome to UBS! First choose location of waste disposal. Currently we work only in Kyiv and selected cities.
location.info-city: The location of Kyiv also includes Hatne, Horenka, Zazymie, Irpin, Kniazhychi, Kotsiubynske, Novosilky, Petropavlivska Borshchahivka, Pohreby, Prolisky, Sofiivska Borshchahivka, Chaiky, and Shchaslyve.
location.info-region: Currently, the Kyiv region includes cities within 20 km of Kyiv

extra-packages-pop-up.title: Extra packages
extra-packages-pop-up.subtitle-start: In addition to packages, UBS Courier can
extra-packages-pop-up.subtitle-end: pick up some extra items of recyclables for recycling
extra-packages-pop-up.subtitle-second: number of extras to the UBS Courier, provided that you meet the following simple conditions:
extra-packages-pop-up.aluminum: aluminum cans (put in a separate sack/bag and tie);
extra-packages-pop-up.metal: household metal (it always tears plastic bags, so it is better to give it in a sack/box);
extra-packages-pop-up.bottles: transparent PET bottles used for drinks (put in a separate sack/bag and tie);
extra-packages-pop-up.cardboard: corrugated cardboard (separate the tape, stickers and all metal staples, and to make it easy to transport, fold it so that it is flat);
extra-packages-pop-up.polyfoam: polyfoam (only if the volume of the package does not exceed 120l per export).
extra-packages-pop-up.condition1: When ordering the service, indicate that you plan to give the Courier free items, as well as their volume.
extra-packages-pop-up.condition2: Fold each type of packaging separately. And if, for example, you only have one frying pan, just give it to the Courier separately.

personal-info.pop-up-comment-placeholder: The road is under repair. Access to the house is available from the house number 15.

confirm-page.order-not-paid: Sorry, your order was not paid for. Please try again.
confirm-page.description: Thank you for your waste control!
confirm-page.questions: If you have any questions, you can

header.caption: It's even easier than before!
header.content: Do you want to take care of our environment and get rid of your waste, but you’re too busy to get to the sorting station? UBS Courier will come to pick up your recyclable materials! We provide emergency garbage assistance.

ubs-courier.info-header: The UBS Courier service will save you time and money on the trip to the station. As a bonus, you will get free delivery on our eco-goods in Kyiv.

content.li_1: Check out our Rules of sorting wastes
content.li_2: Everything you give to the Courier needs to be clean and dry – it’s MUST HAVE.
content.li_3: Recyclables and non-recyclable plastics can be put together in one package/sack of a 120 liters size - we will re-sort everything.
content.li_4: We accept textile wastes (damaged clothes) for the utilization in separate packages of 120l size or 20l size.
content.li_5: 1 package/sack should be up to 30 kg.
content.li_6: If you don't have a package/sack of the necessary size, you can get it right from the Courier or order a whole roll in our store and pack the wastes beforehand to save a lot of time.
content.li_7: The Courier picks up at least 2 packages within Kyiv. Driving a long distance for only 1 package is not environmentally friendly, and it significantly increases the waiting time for each customer. If you live within a radius of 20 km from Kyiv, the Courier takes out 20 packages of 120l.
content.li_8: The courier picks up the packages at the main entrance. You can also leave your packages at the concierge, the security post or any other places where the Courier can easily pick them up.

rules.caption: The necessary rules for picking up damaged clothes

content.li_1: We are taking only rags (clothes, shoes, bags, soft toys, bed linen and towels) for incineration, clothes that are completely unsuitable for wearing. If those clothes can still be useful for someone, please give them to the people who need them.
content.li_2: Large metal parts must be removed from the clothing, and small ones can be left if they are part of it (for example, small zips, buttons, etc.)!
content.li_3: Be sure to remove all metal parts and batteries from the stuffed toys!

price-description.li_1: with recyclable materials and illiquid plastics with a volume of 120l.

steps-title.li_2: Order and pay for the service

steps-content.li_1: Create your personal account, where the history of your orders will be stored.
steps-content.li_2: Preparation of the route will take from 2 to 9 days.
steps-content.li_3: If you can’t be there at the agreed time, then leave the packages at the concierge but be sure to notify the Courier.
steps-content.li_4: Keep track of your order history.

time.pre_2: Courier waiting time is 2-9 business days.

content.pre_1: Along with the export of recyclable materials, you can also order eco-goods from our
content.pre_2: Delivery of goods is free of charge for UBS Courier customers.

sign-up.last-name-must-be-at-least-1-characters-: Last name must be at least 1 characters long

sign-up.password-must-be-at-least-8-characters-l: Password must be at least 8 characters in length
sign-up.too-long-password: Password is too long, a maximum of 20 characters allowed
sign-up.password-spaces-error: Password must be at least 8 characters long without spaces
sign-up.password-symbols-error: Password must contain at least one uppercase letter (A-Z), one lowercase letter (a-z), a digit (0-9), and a special character (~`!@#$%^&*()+=_-{}[]|:;”’?/<>,.)

footer.accept-compost: We accept compost during the week during the working hours of the station (except Monday and Tuesday).
